Class java.awt.KeyboardFocusManager

Added Methods
void clearFocusOwner() Clears the focus owner at both the Java and native levels if the focus owner exists and resides in the same context as the calling thread, otherwise the method returns silently.
 

Changed Methods
void clearGlobalFocusOwner() Change in exceptions thrown from no exceptions to java.lang.SecurityException.
 Clears the global focus owner at both the Java and native levels.
void setGlobalActiveWindow(Window) Change in exceptions thrown from no exceptions to java.lang.SecurityException.
 Sets the active Window.

 Sets the current focus cycle root.

 Sets the focus owner.
void setGlobalFocusedWindow(Window) Change in exceptions thrown from no exceptions to java.lang.SecurityException.
 Sets the focused Window.
void setGlobalPermanentFocusOwner(Component) Change in exceptions thrown from no exceptions to java.lang.SecurityException.
 Sets the permanent focus owner.
